code: const STORAGE_KEY='itineraries';export const saveItinerary=itinerary=>{const existingItineraries=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(STORAGE_KEY)||'[]');const newItinerary={...itinerary,id:Date.now(),createdAt:new Date().toISOString()};const updatedItineraries=[...existingItineraries,newItinerary];localStorage.setItem(STORAGE_KEY,JSON.stringify(updatedItineraries));return newItinerary;};export const getItineraries=()=>{return JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(STORAGE_KEY)||'[]');};
